agramathya ranil wikramasinha mathithuma eda adhyapana amathyawarayawa sitiya di widyathmaka puhunawak laba di guruwarun guru wruththikayan lesa pasal paddhathiyata athulath kirima pinisa adhyapana widyapita aarambha karana lada bawa penwa dun amathyawaraya, adhyapana widya pita, wishwa widyala pita bawata pathkara upadhiyak laba dun pamanin guru wruththiya sambandha prashnaya nowisandena bawath widya pita osse guru puhunuwa men ma owunata upadhi laba ganima sandaha da awasthawa awura nathi bawin widya pita wishwa widyala pita bawata pathkirime yojanawa puduma sahagatha bawath sandahan kaleya.
eya meheyumwalata badhawak bawa da janadhipathi karyalaya niwedanaya kaleya.

wikirana ha rasayanika drawyayan samaga dawase wadi kalayak rasayanagaraye gatha kala mahacharya mari kiyuri mathiniyage maranayata hethuwa lesa waidyawarunge nigamanaya wuye rakthahinathawayayi. ► wishwawidyala adhyayana ithihasaye palamu aacharya upadhilabhiniya. ►lokaye palamu nobel thyagalabhiniya. ►nobel thyagaya dewarak dinagath palamu kanthawa. ►parisiye sobon sarasawiye palamu kantha mahacharyawariya. ►pranshaye mulpele guru abhyasa widyalayaka palamu kantha samajikawa ►samiya, duwa saha bana samaga nobel thagi hatharak dinu ekama widyagnyawariya ►suwisheshi pudgalayange maranin pasu sihiwatana thanpath kerena parisiye ‘penthon’ kauthukagaraye sihiwatanayak thanpath kerunu palamu kanthawa. ►soyaganu labu rasayanika widyathmaka siddhanthayan siya nijabima wana polanthaya namin ‘poloniyam’ lesa lowata dayada kala palamu ha ekama widyagnyawariya. ►wikiranashili gas balayen kriyathmaka karagath ‘punchi kiyuri’ nam rediyograf jangama rathayak thama wisinma padawagena palamu loka yuda samayedi yuda peramunata gos rogi sebalunta prathikara kala palamu nirbhitha kanthawa. ►thama samiyata saha thamata nobel thagga sandaha labunu mudal yudabime rogin sandaha parithyaga kala ekama ha palamu kanthawa ohomayi mari kiyuri mathiniyage kathawa.
